fileUploader.unsupportedFileType: $t(label.errorField) The file you have attempted to upload is not supported
fileUploader.maxSizeExceeded: $t(label.errorField) One or more files is larger than {{ maxFileSize }}
fileUploader.multipleMaxCountExceeded: $t(label.errorField) You have selected more files than allowed. Maximum: {{ maximumFiles }}
fileUploader.multipleMaxSizeExceeded: $t(label.errorField) You have selected one or more files with a total size greater than {{ maxFileSize }}
fileUploader.multipleNotAllowed: $t(label.errorField) You have tried to upload more than {{ count }} file
fileUploader.multipleNotAllowed_plural: $t(label.errorField) You have tried to upload more than a maximum of {{ count }} files

authentication.getStarted: To get started, enter the workspace name associated with your account.
authentication.noAccount: Does your team not yet have an account?
authentication.noReset: Don't need to reset your password?
authentication.policyAgreement: By registering an account, you agree to the following
authentication.privacyConsent: I consent to the collection and storage of my information to handle the processing and operation of my account.

forgotAccountDetails.header: Can't remember your workspace name, or password?
forgotAccountDetails.description: Enter your email address and we will send you instructions on how to get back into your account.

resetPassword.description: Enter a new password below to reset the password to your account.

workspaceModal.title: What is my workspace name?
workspaceModal.body:
Team or organization, every group has a private workspace.
A workspace consists of group members, who collaborate together on projects.

You can find your workspace name on the introductory email you received when you created a new account, or were invited to an existing workspace.

If you can't remember your workspace name, we can help you get back into your account. What would you like to do?
workspaceModal.forgotWorkspace: Help me get back into my account
workspaceModal.newWorkspace: I want to create a new workspace for my team

verifyEmailNotification.welcomeEmailSent: Hi {{ firstName }}, a welcome email was sent to {{ email }}. Please click the link in the email to verify your email address.

overview.title: Overview
overview.leadDescription: Reeve is a Node.js boilerplate framework that assists developers in reducing the setup time required to build production-ready scalable web applications. The framework includes a variety of pre-built pages so you can focus on building your MVP faster.

profile.changeEmailWarning: Before we can change your email address, a confirmation email will be sent to your new email address. Please click the verification link in the email for the change to be applied.
profile.passwordLengthRequirement: Please ensure your new password is longer than 6 characters.

billing.trialDays<1: Less than 1 day left on trial
billing.subscriptionExpired: Your subscription has expired. The page you are looking for might have been disabled. Please contact your administrator.
billing.timeRemaining<1: $t(site.name) is still free for less than a day
billing.selectPlan: Select a plan below to continue using $t(site.name) once your trial expires.
billing.selectPlan_expired: Select a plan below to continue using $t(site.name).

general.workspaceURLUniqueAddress: Your Workspace URL is a unique address you can use to access this workspace from your web browser. Please contact us if you would like to change this address.
general.workspaceDescriptionSubText: A good description of your workspace can provide valuable information to new and invited users.
general.deleteWorkspaceWarning: Deleting a Workspace will remove all contents, users, and active subscriptions. This action cannot be undone. Please make sure you are deleting the correct one!

localization.defaultLanguageSubText: This will change the language that appears on the login screen, in emails, and content shown to new and invited users. It will not change the individual language preferences of existing users.

offline.disconnectedLead: Hey! Looks like you've been disconnected from the internet.
offline.continueAsNormal: You will be able to continue as normal when the browser connects to the internet again.

login.title: Sign In to your Account | $t(site.name)
login.description: Enter your username and password to sign into your account.

register.title: Register for an Account | $t(site.name)
register.description: Complete your registration details to create a client account.

forgot.title: Forgot Account Details | $t(site.name)
forgot.description: Enter your email address to reset your account.

reset.title: Reset Account Password | $t(site.name)
reset.description: Reset the password to your account.

billing.title: Billing | $t(site.name)
billing.description: Manage your account subscription and payments

success.clientRegistration: Success! Your account has been created.
success.forgotPasswordEmail: Success! If an account is associated with this email address, you will receive a message with instructions on how to login or reset the password to your account.
success.changePassword: Success! The password to your account has been changed.
success.resetPassword: Success! The password to your account has been reset.
success.verifyEmail: Success! Your email address has been verified.
success.verifyEmailChange: Success! Your email address has been successfully updated.
success.updatePersonalProfile: Success! Your profile has been updated.
success.changeLanguage: Success! The language $t(site.name) will use has been updated.
success.updateLocalization: Success! Localization settings have been updated.

code.403: You are not authorized to make this request.

error.internalServerError: It looks like something has gone wrong on our system. Don't panic! While our engineers investigate, feel free to contact us and provide the following code for further details. Code: {{ code }}
error.outdatedBrowser: Hey! You are using an out-of-date web browser version. This might cause compatibility issues with our service. Please consider upgrading your browser.
error.verifyEmail: Error: Your email address could not be successfully verified. Please refresh the page and try again.
error.verifyEmailChange: Error: Your email address could not be successfully changed. Please refresh the page and try again.
error.logout: Error: We were unable to logout of your account. Please refresh the page and try again.

validation.resetPasswordInvalidProperties: Reset password code contains invalid properties.
validation.changePasswordInvalidProperties: Change password object contains invalid properties.
validation.verifyEmailInvalidProperties: Verify email object contains invalid properties.
validation.verifyChangeEmailInvalidProperties: Verify change email object contains invalid properties.
validation.invalidPasswordSupplied: Incorrect password supplied. Please enter a valid password.
validation.incorrectCurrentPasswordSupplied: Incorrect current password supplied. Please enter the correct password.
validation.incorrectLoginDetailsSupplied: We are having trouble signing you in. Please check your email address and password, and try again.
validation.userDoesNotExist: A user with this email address does not exist.
validation.changeLanguageInvalidProperties: Language object contains an invalid language selection.
validation.loadUserPropertiesFailed: User properties could not be successfully loaded.
validation.updateClientInvalidProperties: Update client object contains invalid properties.
validation.updateLocalizationInvalidProperties: Update localization object contains invalid properties.
validation.updateProfileInvalidProperties: Update profile object contains invalid properties.
validation.registeredWorkspaceURL: Sorry, this workspace name has already been used.
validation.emptyResetCode: Password reset code does not exist or is invalid.
validation.emptyVerifyCode: Verify email code does not exist or is invalid.
validation.sendNewVerify: Please send a new verification email and use the provided code.
validation.sendNewReset: Please send a new password reset email and use the provided code.
validation.resetCodeAlreadyUsed: This password reset code has already been used. $t(validation.sendNewReset)
validation.resetCodeExpired: This password reset code has expired. It could be used within a {{ gracePeriod }} hour period. $t(validation.sendNewReset)
validation.verifyCodeAlreadyUsed: This verify email code has already been used. $t(validation.sendNewVerify)
validation.verifyCodeExpired: This verify email code has expired. It could be used within a {{ gracePeriod }} hour period. $t(validation.sendNewVerify)
validation.verifyEmail: Please verify your email address before selecting a plan.
validation.emailAlreadyVerified: This email address has already been verified. Please reload the page to continue.
validation.emptyChangeEmailCode: Change email code does not exist or is invalid.
validation.changeEmailCodeAlreadyUsed: This change email code has already been used. Please change your email address on the profile page to send a new email.
validation.changeEmailCodeExpired: This change email code has expired. It could be used within a {{ gracePeriod }} hour period.
validation.signedURLInvalidProperties: Signed URL object contains invalid properties.

validators.notIncluded: $t(label.errorField) Is not included in the list.
validators.validCharactersAZ09: $t(label.errorField) Field can only contain characters from a-z and 0-9, and no spaces.
validators.invalidPasswordLength: $t(label.errorField) Password field must be greater than 6 characters.
validators.unmatchedPasswords: $t(label.errorField) Confirm Password should match New Password.
